name: epiphenomenally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to an epiphenomenon (= something that exists and can be seen, felt, etc. at the same time as another thing but is not related to it): Music and religion are epiphenomenally connected to each other. These changes have happened epiphenomenally, as by-product of political shifts in this country. Related word
epiphenomenal
More examplesFewer examplesFeatures shared by the two languages occur epiphenomenally, as an indirect consequence of their grammatical similarity.The two conditions may be entities which only differ epiphenomenally.Solving one problem also solved another, epiphenomenally.
